plot: While grappling with the dilemma of whether or not to open his father's case file, Michael discovers the truth about Maggie.

Michael gets an evidence file about his family after sleeping with the Maggie Lizer, the prosecuting attorney. But he suspects that she's not exactly telling the truth, so he sends Tobias to her house to investigate, who finds out that she's not blind. Meanwhile, Gob's divorce does not go as smoothly as planned.—halo1k
